channel.title: Finance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Finance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump's $2K tariff dividends could carry a hefty price tag
item.description: Trump's $2,000 tariff dividend plan could cost $600 billion annually, far exceeding current tariff revenues of $300 billion per year, budget watchdog ...

item.title: Wembanyama, Morant Suffer Calf Strains. Why Injury Rate Is Up In NBA
item.description: Victor Wembanyama and Ja Morant are the latest NBA players to suffer calf strains. The injury rate in general is up this season. Here are some possibl...

item.title: Nvidia CEO says AI will actually make everyone a lot busier: ‘Everybody’s jobs will be different’
item.description: “I would say that there's every evidence that we will be more productive and yet still be busier because we have so many ideas,” Jensen Huang said.

item.title: The stock market’s ‘fear gauge’ spiked to its highest level since Trump’s ‘Liberation Day’ tariffs caused a global selloff
item.description: Tech valuations, interest rates, and geopolitical risks are creating a "perfect storm" of uncertainty.

item.title: Samsung’s Updated Special Offers To Galaxy S25 Ultra Buyers
item.description: Samsung's new Galaxy S25 Ultra Black Friday deal just dropped the phone to £849. But beware: a lower price already came and went. Find out if you shou...

item.title: How Principal Financial’s new CEO brought AI religion to the C-suite, and then worked to upskill 20,000 employees
item.description: Principal Financial CEO Deanna Strable has made AI literacy a key focus across all levels of the company.

item.title: Jeff Bezos’ most expensive investment is a $500 million custom superyacht that’s the largest in the world
item.description: The Amazon founder even paid an extra $75 million for another yacht to support his superyacht.

item.title: How Social Bonds Protect The Brain—and How Tech Can Help
item.description: National Geographic’s new special with Chris Hemsworth highlights how social connection shapes brain health, while emerging AI tools help spot early s...

item.title: France to probe Elon Musk’s Grok after it said Holocaust gas chambers were used for ‘disinfection’ against ‘typhus’ rather than murder
item.description: Earlier this year, Musk’s company took down posts from the chatbot that appeared to praise Adolf Hitler after complaints about antisemitic content.

item.title: One Of Netflix’s Best Shows Is Back With A Stellar Rotten Tomatoes Score
item.description: Netflix has a great new show on its top 10 list, a return series boasting a 93% Rotten Tomatoes score. Check it out.

item.title: Netgem Unveils New Freely-Compatible ‘PLEIO’ Streaming Puck
item.description: The latest step towards freeing U.K. households from their reliance on TV aerials is here.

item.title: U.S. dollar registers six-month high before retreat
Tom Lee says five reasons led to Thursday's stock drop. He's making this move.

item.description: Federal Reserve policymakers remain divided on December interest rate cuts as FOMC minutes revealed differing views on monetary policy amid inflation ...

item.title: Voters express economic worries over inflation as costs rise, Fox News poll finds
item.description: A Fox News poll shows 76% of voters view the economy negatively, with 61% disapproving of President Donald Trump's economic handling amid rising costs...

item.title: DEI consultant resigns from Cracker Barrel board after heated proxy fight
item.description: Cracker Barrel shareholders backed nine of 10 board nominees, including CEO Julie Felss Masino.

item.title: US added 119K jobs in September, delayed jobs report shows
item.description: The Labor Department released the September jobs report, which showed that job growth continued at a subdued pace amid economic uncertainty over trade...

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Raving About a Made-in-China AI Model
item.description: DeepSeek is called “amazing and impressive” despite working with less-advanced chips.

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup
item.description: The LinkedIn co-founder is starting Manas AI with “The Emperor of All Maladies” author Siddhartha Mukherjee.

item.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: DeepSeek, SoFi and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
